metadata.synopsis: Lae'zel says this AD as she attacks the player for the following actions:- You walk out of the Creche Security office after Vlaakith orders you to enter the Astral Prism- You attack the Inquisitor
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CRE_Main_AMake sure you have Laezel with you.Go to 1392; -2; -780 and enter the captain's office and get through the dialoggo to 1357; -7; -689enter the security officetalk to the inquisitor, and show him the artifacttalk to Vlaakith and tell her you won't do itLaezel should have left the party and is waiting for you to enter the Astral PrismLeave the security office - Lae'zel will go hostile, and trigger this AD.

0.speaker: Lae'zel
0.text: I warned you, and you still turn away. This will not stand!
